{"step_by_step_thinking": "The vertebral column, also known as the spine, is made up of 33 individual bones that interlock with each other to form a column. This includes 7 cervical vertebrae, 12 thoracic vertebrae, 5 lumbar vertebrae, 5 sacral vertebrae (fused into one sacrum), and 4 coccygeal vertebrae (fused into one coccyx).", "answer_choice": "B"}
